DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Essential Face Paint - Dark Brown (32 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Essential Dark Brown Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based professional face paint. Renders lively colors and provides solid coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking. Diamond FX maintains brightness and density even when painted over other colors. Diamond FX Essential is ideal for blending, layering or line work. Requires only a small amount of water. Hypo-allergenic and non-toxic; free of perfumes.
Diamond FX is manufactured according to the EEC and FDA regulations. Tested in the Netherlands. FDA does not recommend using reds and blues (this includes greens and purples) around the eye and lip area or leaving them on the skin for long. Avoid contact with upholstery, fabric and carpets.
Comes in 32 gm size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strongly pigmented water-based face paint that is perfect for line work, blending or layering.
Provides superb, opaque coverage that lasts all day without fading or cracking.
Retains brightness and density even when painted over other colors.
Easy to apply either with a sponge or a brush. Removes easily with soap and water.
Each 1.13 ounces (32 gm) Face Paint Container is good for 50-200 applications.

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Neon Face Paint Refill - White (10 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Neon White Refill comes in 10 gm size that is perfect for refilling Diamond FX 10 gm palettes. Diamond FX Neon White looks normal under daylight but glows intensely under black light. Great for night events, clubs and parties where black light is very trendy these days. Diamond FX Neon Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based face paint that gives great coverage that lasts all day without cracking or fading. Works great with minimal amount of water. Perfume-free and gentle on skin. Maintains density and brightness even when applied over other colors.
Tested in the Netherlands. Diamond FX Neon White contains ingredients that have been approved by the FDA to be used in cosmetics and hence have relatively less black light effect than other colors. Diamond FX Neon Colors are not recommended for use around lips and eyes. Avoid contact with upholstery, carpets and fabric.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Strongly pigmented water-based face paint that creates glowing effects under black light.
Perfect for night clubs and parties where black light is very popular these days.
Not recommended for use around eyes and lips.
Easy to apply either with a sponge or a brush. Removes easily with soap and water.
Each 0.35 ounces (10 gm) Refill Container is good for 20 applications.

DescriptionData.Title: Diamond FX Neon Face Paint - Yellow (32 gm)
DescriptionData.Description:
Diamond FX Neon Yellow looks bright under daylight but glows intensely under black light. Great for night events, clubs and parties where black light is very trendy these days. Diamond FX Neon Face Paint is a strongly pigmented water-based face paint that gives great coverage that lasts all day without cracking or fading. Works great with minimal amount of water. Perfume-free and gentle on skin. Maintains density and brightness even when applied over other colors.
Tested in the Netherlands. Diamond FX Neon Yellow contains certain neon pigments that haven't been tested by the FDA, and is therefore labeled for use on hair and special effects only, and not a cosmetic. Diamond FX Neon Colors are not recommended for use around lips and eyes. Avoid contact with upholstery, carpets and fabric.
Comes in 32 gm size.
